definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]

sentences.english: Convinced of his own righteousness, he was the perfect impersonation of a man of rectitude .
sentences.chinese: 他確信自己很正直，可以完美地扮演剛正不阿的人。

sentences.english: Convinced of his own righteousness, he was the perfect impersonation of a man of rectitude.

definition: lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
full of political wisdom (idiom)/politically astute/with encyclopedic experience of state policy
standing above the common crowd (idiom); outstanding/excellent and unrivaled
